possible_conditions.name: Anxiety and Stress (Chittodvega)
possible_conditions.description: Mental agitation and excessive worry affecting nervous system and mind
possible_conditions.ayurvedic_perspective: Vata imbalance causing instability in mind and nervous system, affecting Prana Vata

immediate_actions: Drink warm chamomile or brahmi tea
herbal_remedies: Ashwagandha for stress and anxiety relief
Brahmi for mental clarity and calmness
recommendations.when_to_consult_doctor: If anxiety is severe, interfering with daily life, or accompanied by suicidal thoughts

dosha_imbalance.description: Vata imbalance causing instability in mind and nervous system, affecting Prana Vata
